src:
Dedik Setiawan Siap Jalani Operasi Penggantian ACL
06 Nov 2019, 20:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan angkat bicara soal proses operasi yang akan ia lakukan pada Kamis (07/11) besok. Penyerang Arema FC ini mengaku sudah siap untuk menjalani proses awal pemulihan cederanya tersebut.
"Bismillah, insyaallah siap. Ini memang hal yang harus dijalani," ucap Dedik.
"Mohon doanya agar semua berjalan lancar," sambungnya.
Dedik mengaku tak ada persiapan khusus baginya untuk melakoni operasi ini. Yang dilakukannya, menurut pemain berusia 25 tahun tersebut, hanyalah puasa 6 jam sebelum operasi ini dilakukan.
"Selain itu, saya tidak ada persiapan apa-apa. Saya nggak tahu karena ini pertama kali dan insyaallah terakhir saya operasi," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Dedik mengalami masalah di ligamen lutut kanannya. ACL pemain berusia 25 tahun ini putus.
Dedik sendiri sudah sempat kembali bermain usai absen. Bahkan, pada laga tunda pekan kelima Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra PSM Makassar, yang dihelat pada medio Oktober lalu, ia sukses mencetak gol.
Namun, usai pertandingan ini, cedera Dedik kambuh. Walhasil, ia dipulangkan ke Malang, dan harus absen pada dua laga tandang berikutnya, kontra Persipura Jayapura dan PS TIRA.

Bagaimana komentar Dedik soal proses pemulihan cedera, yang diprediksi bakal lama? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Dedik Setiawan is Ready to Conduct ACL Replacement Operation
Nov 6, 2019, 20:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan spoke up about the operation process he will do on Thursday (07/11) tomorrow. The Arema FC striker admitted he was ready to undergo the initial process of recovering the injury.
"Bismillah, God willing, ready. This is indeed something that must be lived," said Dedik.
"Please pray that everything will go smoothly," he continued.
Dedik claimed there was no special preparation for him to carry out this operation. What he did, according to the 25-year-old player, was fasting 6 hours before the operation was carried out.
"Besides, I have nothing to prepare. I don't know because this is the first time and God willing I will be operating," he said.
Previously, Dedik had problems in his right knee ligament. The 25-year-old ACL player broke up.
Dedik himself had once returned to play after missing. In fact, in the match postponed for the fifth week of the Shopee Liga 1 season 2019, contra PSM Makassar, which was held in mid-October, he successfully scored.
However, after this match, Dedik's injury recurred. As a result, he was sent back to Malang, and had to be absent in the next two away games, against Persipura Jayapura and PS TIRA.

How about Dedik's comment about the injury recovery process, which is predicted to take a long time? See below.
